document.discussion_title: Rock Island Football ready for new season. - Story
document.topic_text:
Rock Island Football ready for new season. The Rock Island Rocks are ready to go for 2016. By Jay Kidwell | Updated 08/21 2016 10:49PM ROCK ISLAND, Ill. The Rock Island Rocks are very motivated for the new football season ahead, the Rocks will open up on August 26 at home against Alton.
Copyright 2016 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
